snippet.title: Aztecs The Last Sun - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Aztecs The Last Sun is a city-building simulator that tells about the settlement of the Aztec civilization on the territory of modern Mexico. You need to build buildings, fight enemies, develop the economy. Players are waiting for the development of civilization XIII to XVI century with a certain historical realism.

GAME PROFILE:
Developer: Play2Chill S.A.
Publisher: Play2Chill S.A.
Genre: City-building Game
Platform: PC
Release date: -

Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHxh4520qdDRQ751oNjBa7A?sub_confirmation=1

#AztecsTheLastSun #GameTrailers #games2023
